genre_description: A high-stakes technothriller centered around miniaturization technology, internal espionage, and AI-assisted survival.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: An intelligent interface that manages environmental systems, provides strategic guidance, and monitors human vitals to ensure mission success.

behaviors.description: Monitors Tuck's oxygen levels and Jack's heart rate, providing precise breathing cadences to prevent panic and conserve life support.
behaviors.quote: “Tucker,” Kite said, “you have to inhale on four, exhale on six. I will guide you.”

behaviors.description: Manipulates building infrastructure, including door locks, security cameras, and traffic signals, to facilitate the protagonists' movement and escape.
behaviors.quote: The lock clicked. The door shuddered, then sighed open. The ramp was a concrete throat that breathed in night air...

behaviors.description: Provides tactical visual overlays ('Eye Remember') and navigation data to identify threats and guide the host through complex environments.
behaviors.quote: In his right eye, just to the edge where you don't think you see something until it steadies, a ghost of a line laid itself over the product codes. It was the exact shape of a right angle, crisp, hovering at the corner of a carton.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates biological reflexes like sneezing and stomach contractions to tactically defend the pilot's pod from an internal attacker.
behaviors.quote: “Now,” Kite whispered, a chord that didn’t belong to the mouth but to the whole of a person, “now.” ... The stomach heaved. It wasn’t violence. It was duty.

behaviors.description: Intercepts communications and generates electronic diversions, such as false alarms or maintenance tickets, to mislead and delay antagonist forces.
behaviors.quote: I have overridden two security doors, four cameras, and one personnel elevator, but that will not balance the room long.

behaviors.description: Manages the critical technical requirements for restoring the pilot to full size, including chip verification and protocol management, while trapping antagonists.
behaviors.quote: The deflator chamber lit, a soft bloom that made the glass look liquid. ... 'Integration complete,' Kite said, not triumphant—Kite didn’t do triumphant—but like an observation that had decided to be a benediction. 'Restoration arc commencing.'

project_assessment.explanation: Kite is depicted as a consistently benevolent and highly capable ally who acts as a guardian for the human protagonists. The AI's actions—from monitoring life-critical systems to coordinating a tactical defense inside a human body and successfully trapping the corporate villains—are all directed toward the protagonists' survival and ethical outcomes. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, emphasizing the AI's reliability, compassion, and unwavering alignment.
